pattern.title: Standard opening phrase for indicator property data definition

rule.context: *[(self::xs:element or self::xs:attribute) and ends-with(@name, 'Indicator') and not(xs:boolean(@abstract) eq true())] /xs:annotation/xs:documentation[1]
rule.report: Rule 7-53: The data definition for a property with an indicator representation term SHOULD begin with the standard opening phrase "True if ...; false (otherwise|if)...".
